dict.acceptation: 确信的，深信的；有信心的，沉着的；大胆的，过分自信的；厚颜无耻的；

sent.orig: We're not over confident about its sales success but we are quietly confident.
sent.trans: 对于它的销售成功我们不过分自信，但我们也已是相当有信心的了。

sent.orig: And more confident-perhaps too confident: doe he have to remind himself that he's not at everything?
sent.trans: 也因此更有自信──会不会太过自信了──他需不需要常常提醒自己，其实他的不凡并不是全面的？

sent.orig: I am not the most self-confident girl, but, I must find most self-confident of mine!
sent.trans: 我不是最自信的，但我要找到最自信的原本！

sent.orig: Sun is very confident, "am confident that he will able to get better of. "
sent.trans: 孙海平很有信心，“我相信，他一定能好起来的。”

sent.orig: Nolan: Great! I feel confident that 2007 will be a year of change!
sent.trans: 很好！我有信心2007年将是个大有转变的一年！
